data.actual_result: a red banner will appear like you screen recording, for a few seconds
data.expected_result: nothing should appear on the top of your screen
data.short_description: A red banner flashes across the screen after hit cancel in nearby friends
data.steps_to_repro: - start up discord  - go all the way up to the top of your server list and click on the three heads - select friends and tap on the right of your screen - now go to the top right corner and select the head with a + sign  - click find a friend a follow any prompts it might give you - once you have done those hit find friends again and during the searching progress hit close and observe the top of your screen
